title: One day in the life of Rajko Maksim
brief_description: A look at a goose herd in rural Yugoslavia. From early morning Rajku Maksim gathers together the villagers’ geese until it is time to return them at dusk. A non-narrated photographic essay. Suitable for upper primary level.
